title: DJ

sections.heading: HOW TO PLAY
sections.body:
• In this game, the switch user creates their own playlist of songs. The playlist could be for a party, golden time, or even for listening in the car.
• Record "next" on one switch and "add to the list" on the other.
• Use a music‑streaming service to create a playlist that can be saved.
• Start playing a song or say the name of an artist.
• If the switch user chooses "next" skip to the next song or name a different artist.
• If the switch user chooses "add to the list", add the current song (or a song by the artist you just named) to the playlist.

tooltipText: Use 2 switches to scan through different songs and create a custom playlist
